name: Jungle Guardians
description: Travel to the depths of the Amazon Rainforest, build a wildlife center, and rescue exotic species in Jungle Guardians!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 1.5 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 750 MB available space
